Player History
Injured on 4/24/2001 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/7/2002 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 4/21/2004, off Ricardo Rodriguez (BOS)...
Drove in 6 runs against Tampa Bay on 4/25/2004...
Traded from Oakland to San Diego on 5/9/2005 (Going to SDN: CF T. Cobo, P C. Shoup. Going to OAK: LF I. Suzuki)...
Traded from San Diego to Oakland on 2/28/2007 (Going to SDN: P I. Montejano. Going to OAK: CF T. Cobo)...
Traded from Oakland to San Francisco on 4/1/2008 (Going to SFN: P M. Buehrle, CF T. Cobo. Going to OAK: P J. Smith, P D. O'Day)...
Traded from San Francisco to Tampa Bay on 2/25/2009 (Going to SFN: SS J. Rollins, RF J. Drew. Going to TB: P A. Dardar, C W. Castillo, CF T. Cobo)...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Los Angeles on 2/25/2010 (Going to LA: CF T. Cobo. Going to TB: DH R. White, SS R. Washington)...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2010...
Injured on 7/31/2011 with a Broken Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/2/2012 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/2/2012 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 3/1/2016 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 8th round, 207th overall pick, by St. Louis in 2019...
Released by St. Louis on 4/1/2019...
Drafted in 6th round, 152nd overall pick, by Minnesota in 2020...
Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by Boston in 1977...
Injured on 4/28/1979 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/22/1982...
